title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLM or chat backend in chains & agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, fluent API, Android compatible.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub-Copilot-like pair programmer.

title: ollama-zsh
summary: Zsh plugin with completions and handy aliases for managing Ollama models from the terminal.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & autoscaling support.

title: ollama-nvidia-docker
summary: Official container images with CUDA for GPU-accelerated inference on Nvidia cards.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Minimal Streamlit app showing RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Llama 2.

title: discord-ollama-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model; slash commands & threads.

title: ollama-model-gallery
summary: Curated list of community-tuned GGUF models ready to pull with one-liner Modelfile examples.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that brings local LLM assistance to your knowledge base; summarize, rewrite, Q&A.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app exposing Ollama models via REST with admin UI and async workers.

title: ollama-cli-tools
summary: Collection of shell scripts to bulk pull, convert, benchmark and monitor Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models as generators & embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-rag-stack
summary: Docker-compose stack chaining Ollama, Qdrant, LangChain and FastAPI for turnkey RAG service.

title: ollama-minecraft
summary: Spigot plugin letting players chat in-game with a local LLM powered by Ollama.
